src/lib/dash/Algorithm.react.js.description:
Algorithm is exposing a source or filter to a downstream filter
It takes the following set of properties:
  - vtkClass: vtkClassName
  - state: {}

id.description: The ID used to identify this component.

state.description: set of property values for vtkClass

src/lib/dash/CellData.react.js.description: CellData is exposing a vtkCellData to a downstream element

src/lib/dash/DataArray.react.js.description:
DataArray is creating a vtkDataArray for the container fields
It takes the following set of properties:
  - type: 'Float32Array', 'Float64Array', 'Uint16Array', ...
  - values: [number, number, ...]
  - numberOfComponents: 1,
  - registration: 'addArray', 'setScalars', ...

id.description: The ID used to identify this component.

values.description: Actual values to use inside our array

registration.description: Name of the method to call on the fieldData (addArray, setScalars, setVectors...)

src/lib/dash/FieldData.react.js.description: FieldData is exposing a FieldData to a downstream element

src/lib/dash/GeometryRepresentation.reac.description:
GeometryRepresentation is responsible to convert a vtkPolyData into rendering
It takes the following set of properties:
  - actor: Properties to assign to the vtkActor
  - mapper: Properties to assign to the vtkMapper
  - property: Properties to assign to the vtkProperty (actor.getProperty())
  - colorMapPreset: Name of the preset to use for controlling the color mapping
  - colorDataRange: Range to use for the color scale

id.description: The ID used to identify this component.

actor.description: Properties to set to the actor

mapper.description: Properties to set to the actor

property.description: Properties to set to the actor.property

colorMapPreset.description: Preset name for the lookup table color map

colorDataRange.description: Data range use for the colorMap

showCubeAxes.description: Show/Hide Cube Axes for the given representation

cubeAxesStyle.description:
Configure cube Axes style by overriding the set of properties defined
https://github.com/Kitware/vtk-js/blob/HEAD/Sources/Rendering/Core/CubeAxesActor/index.js#L703-L719

showScalarBar.description: Show hide scalar bar for that representation

scalarBarTitle.description: Use given string as title for scalar bar. By default it is empty (no title).

scalarBarStyle.description:
Configure scalar bar style by overriding the set of properties defined
https://github.com/Kitware/vtk-js/blob/master/Sources/Rendering/Core/ScalarBarActor/index.js#L776-L796

src/lib/dash/PointData.react.js.description: PointData is exposing a vtkPointData to a downstream element

src/lib/dash/PolyData.react.js.description:
PolyData is exposing a vtkPolyData to a downstream filter
It takes the following set of properties:
  - points: [x, y, z, x, y, z, ...],
  - verts: [cellSize, pointId0, pointId1, ..., cellSize, pointId0, ...]
  - lines: [cellSize, pointId0, pointId1, ..., cellSize, pointId0, ...]
  - polys: [cellSize, pointId0, pointId1, ..., cellSize, pointId0, ...]
  - strips: [cellSize, pointId0, pointId1, ..., cellSize, pointId0, ...]
Cell connectivity helper property:
  - connectivity: 'manual', // [manual, points, triangles, strips]

id.description: The ID used to identify this component.

connectivity.description: Type of connectivity `manual` or implicit such as `points`, `triangles`, `strips`

src/lib/dash/View.react.js.description:
View is responsible to render vtk.js data.
It takes the following set of properties:
  - `background`: [0.2, 0.3, 0.4]
  - `cameraPosition`: [0, 0, 1]
  - `cameraViewUp`: [0, 1, 0]
  - `cameraParallelProjection`: false
  - `showOrientationAxes`: true

id.description: The ID used to identify this component.

style.description: Allow user to override the default View style { width: '100%', height: '100%' }

className.description: Allow user to provide custom className associated to root element

background.description:
The color of the view background using 3 floating numbers
between 0-1 of Red, Green, Blue component.

cameraPosition.description: Initial camera position from an object in [0,0,0]

cameraViewUp.description: Initial camera position from an object in [0,0,0]

triggerRender.description: Property use to trigger a render when changing.

triggerResetCamera.description: Property use to trigger a resetCamera when changing.

pickingModes.description: List of picking listeners to bind. The supported values are `click` and `hover`. By default it is disabled (empty array).

clickInfo.description:
Read-only prop. To use this, make sure that `pickingModes` contains `click`.
This prop is updated when an element in the map is clicked. This contains
the picking info describing the object being clicked on.

hoverInfo.description:
Read-only prop. To use this, make sure that `pickingModes` contains `hover`.
This prop is updated when an element in the map is hovered. This contains
the picking info describing the object being hovered.
